pizzas.title: Margherita
pizzas.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

pizzas.title: Pepperoni
pizzas.description: Pizza loaded with pepperoni slices and mozzarella cheese.

pizzas.title: Vegetarian
pizzas.description: Healthy pizza with assorted vegetables like bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and olives.

pizzas.title: Meat Lovers
pizzas.description: Satisfy your meat cravings with this pizza topped with pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham.

pizzas.title: BBQ Chicken
pizzas.description: Delicious pizza featuring BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, onions, and cilantro.

pizzas.title: Hawaiian
pizzas.description: A tropical delight with ham, pineapple chunks, and mozzarella cheese.

pizzas.title: Supreme
pizzas.description: Loaded with a variety of toppings including pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, and olives.

pizzas.title: Buffalo Chicken
pizzas.description: Spicy buffalo sauce paired with grilled chicken, onions, and blue cheese crumbles.
